Development build
=================
  Create a development build (https://docs.expo.dev/develop/development-builds/create-a-build/)

  > npm install -g eas-cli
  > eas build --profile development --platform android
  > adb install development-build.apk
  > npx expo start

Preview build
=================
  -Create first build (https://docs.expo.dev/build/setup/)
  -Build APKs for Android Emulators and devices (https://docs.expo.dev/build-reference/apk/)

/*
  - eas build -p android --profile preview
  - npx eas build -p android --profile preview

  npx eas-cli build -p android --profile preview
*/

-This is the recommended sequence
  nvm use 18

  npm install --save-dev eas-cli
  npm install cosmiconfig --save-dev

  npx eas --version
  npx eas build -p android --profile preview
